entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Farnham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Granby 10:45 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
